TopicTitle: Mouse Pointer Disappears at start menu

Articles.Content:
game loads up, but then at the Entry screen the mouse disappears, so can't select start new game, settings, nothing.

This is on a Lenovo Legion 7 16IAX7 - type 82TD. That has a i7-12800HX Processor, 2 x 16 GB DRR5-4800, and a NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX™ 3070 Ti. Using the built in track pad as the mouse. 

Edited February 24, 2023 by RocketJockey
updating hardware information

oh and it came up to the UELA the first time and I couldn't select the AGREE button, even after scrolling through to the bottom of the UELA. That required an ALT+F4 to get out of and a time or two of that and I finally got to the entry screen.
okay, looks like some mouse pointer settings were causing a problem. Still not having great luck with trackpad clicks. Breaking out a mouse to test that.
I had switched left and right mouse buttons (because I'm a left). Apparently that is frowned upon in KSP2. Once I reset that the mouse and  mouse clicks behave.
